meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indubitable; certainty.
meanings.sent1: The indubitabilities of his honesty were evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: There was no question about the indubitabilities of her talent.
meanings.sent3: The indubitabilities of his love for pizza were proven by his daily orders.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an indubitabilities of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The indubitabilities of the sunrise brought a sense of peace to the morning.

meanings.definition: Something that is indubitable; a fact or truth that is beyond doubt.
meanings.sent1: The scientist presented the indubitabilities of his research findings.
meanings.sent2: The indubitabilities of the law were clear to all who read it.
meanings.sent3: The indubitabilities of his fear of spiders made him jump at the sight of a tiny one.
meanings.sent4: The indubitabilities of her kindness shone through in every action.
meanings.sent5: The indubitabilities of the mountain's grandeur took his breath away.
